name: tropical tiki temple
description:
welcome to the world of tropical tiki temple - a 60 seconds local multiplayer that takes place in a (as the name suggests) tropical tiki universe.

player one: you got 60 seconds to set up traps to make your opponents life the hardest - choose your character wisely as both tikis got different traps.

player two: show your jumping skills and get to the top of the temple before running out of time - it won't be easy but don't give up!

this game was done during a school game jam and is therefore far from perfect and complete, so keep that in mind. we still hope you have a lot of fun playing this game! feel free to leave comments, critics and suggestions ♥
